item.title: JPMorgan upgrades Coinbase, saying the shares are cheap and a 25% rally is ahead
item.description: JPMorgan sees shares of Coinbase rallying 25% from here.

item.title: As Netflix dips below its 200-day moving average, Josh Brown says to buy shares here
item.description: After this week's post-earnings selloff, shares of Netflix fell below their 200-day moving average, a key technical indicator.

item.title: This one-time 10-bagger looks poised to make another run, says Carter Worth
item.description: The chart analyst breaks down the charts on Zoom.

item.title: Former chip champion Intel is making a comeback. How to keep riding the rally with less risk
item.description: Intel has been on a parabolic move higher and the third quarter earnings report confirmed that this battered and bruised former chip champion is back.

item.title: Why Jana's partnership with Travis Kelce could tip the balance and revive Six Flags' business
